name: Hardest "The Kelly Song" Trivia Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: First of all, who is Kelly?
questions.explanation:
Woody's girlfriend.

	Kelly Susan Gaines was played by Jackie Swanson.

questions.text: Woody wrote the lyrics and music to this song all by himself.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Kelly: "I loved the song, Woody."  Woody: "The words or the tune?"  Kelly: "The words especially." Woody: "Good 'cause I sorta ripped off the tune."

questions.text: Okay now time to see if you know the actual song. Fill in the blank with the right word. "Kelly my darling, you are my ____________".
questions.explanation:
sunshine.

	At this point of the song it sounds like a lovely song.

questions.text: "You're smile is so lovely; your hair is so ___________".
questions.explanation:
clean.

	Actually this song isn't bad. I mean it's not Shakespeare, but Woody did write it from his heart.

questions.text: "You make me feel like the whole world is _________."
questions.explanation:
mine.

	Woody really loves Kelly and his trying his hardest to show her and her family just how much he cares about her.

questions.text: How many times does Woody sing "Kelly" in the chorus part of the song before he spells the name out?
questions.explanation:
12.

	Everyone starts to wonder if he'll ever stop singing her name.

questions.text: How many times does he sing "mine" after the words "of mine"?
questions.explanation:
17.

	After he sings "of mine" they start to clap thinking the song is over, but then Woody starts to sing all the "mines".

questions.text: Why did Woody write this song for Kelly anyway?
questions.explanation:
her birthday.

	Woody knew he couldn't compete with her rich relatives and friends with buying a gift, so he decided to give her a gift from the heart.

questions.text: After Woody sings the song, what does Kelly ask him?
options: How long did that take you to write?
Did you have to sing that infront of my dad?
questions.explanation:
Where's my gift?.

	Kelly is so rich, she can't understand that Woody doesn't have money. She thinks the fact he has a job is "cute".

questions.text: Woody and Kelly break up at the end of the episode.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Of course they stay together, a few seasons later they get married in fact. Plus in season 11 she's pregnant.
